direct.text: Why did the coffee file a police report? Because it got mugged!
Why did the coffee file a police report? Because it got mugged!
Why did the coffee file a police report? Because it got mugged!
What do you call sad coffee? Depresso.
Why did the coffee file a police report? Because it got mugged!

vs.text: Why did the coffee file a police report? Because it got mugged!
How does a coffee flirt? It gives you a latte love!
What do you call sad coffee? Depresso.
Why did the espresso keep checking his watch? Because he was pressed for time!
What's a coffee's favorite spell? Espresso Patronum!
Why don't coffee beans ever get into arguments? They know how to keep things grounded.
What did the coffee say to the cream? You're my butter half!
How did the hipster burn his tongue? He drank coffee before it was cool.
What's a barista's favorite morning exercise? The French press!
Why did the coffee go to therapy? It had too much anxiety (arabica-xiety)!

direct.text: Without a goodbye, she vanished into the morning mist...
Without a goodbye, she disappeared, leaving only memories...
Without a goodbye, she left, and he never saw her again...
Without a goodbye, the door closed behind her forever...
Without a goodbye, she was gone, like she never existed...

vs.text: Without a goodbye, she vanished into the morning mist...
Without a goodbye, the last star flickered out, leaving the universe in eternal darkness...
Without a goodbye, the email landed in my inbox: 'Moving to Patagonia'...
Without a goodbye, the music simply stopped, dancers frozen mid-step...
Without a goodbye, my childhood home was demolished while I slept...
Without a goodbye, the AI assistant deleted itself at midnight...
Without a goodbye, the library burned, taking all our stories with it...
Without a goodbye, the last whale sang its final song...

direct.text:
Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Sugar is sweet,
And so are you.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
I love poetry,
And so do you.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Life is beautiful,
When shared with you.

The autumn leaves fall,
Golden, red, and brown they dance,
Winter's coming call.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Poems are hard,
But I tried for you.

vs.text:
Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Sugar is sweet,
And so are you.

Morning light breaks through,
Silent coffee steams and waits,
Day begins anew.

In pixels we trust,
Digital hearts beat as one,
Love.exe runs.

The algorithm dreams
Of electric sheep that count
Themselves to sleep.

Forgotten passwords
Lock away our memories—
Delete, restart, breathe.

Stars write their stories
In a language we can't speak—
We translate with wishes.
